data.message: Sorry not touching that can of poison! (Aspartame) bring back Coke life... actually don't bother green cola is much better

replies.message: Green cola much healthier they use coffee beans for caffeine. There NO aspartame! NO additives! Just all natural ingredients yet still has the best cola taste!
Mark Edwards Then just drink that, I'll happily keep poisoning myself.

My doctor actually told me to stop drinking diet drinks and having artificial sweeteners as they can cause serious stomach and intestinal problems.  I ended up with a stomach ulcer as was drinking a can of coke zero a day and having 2 sweeteners in coffee (approx 3-4 cups per day).  Aspartame is dangerous if consumed frequently.
This green cola is by far much better!! All natural! No chemicals which Coke use
